com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Interface KTexturesRequiredType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KLightDiffuseOnlyType, KLightDirectionalType, KLightProjectiveType, KLightProjectiveWithShadowBasicType, KLightProjectiveWithShadowVarianceType, KLightSphereType, KLightTranslucentType, KLightType, KLightWithShadowType, KLightWithTransformType, KMaterialAlbedoType, KMaterialAlphaType, KMaterialEmissiveType, KMaterialEnvironmentType, KMaterialNormalType, KMaterialOpaqueType, KMaterialRefractiveType, KMaterialRegularType, KMaterialSpecularNotNoneType, KMaterialSpecularType, KMaterialTranslucentType, KMaterialType
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface KTexturesRequiredType
    The number of textures a particular object (typically a material or light) requires when rendering.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int texturesGetRequired() 

    • Method Detail

      • texturesGetRequired

        int texturesGetRequired()
        Returns:
        The number of textures required (concurrently) to render the current object.
